uvi.product_version: versions from v4.13 to before v5.15.5
uvi.description:
iavf: free q_vectors before queues in iavf_disable_vf

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.5 by commit 9ef6589cac9a8c47f5544ccdf4c498093733bb3f, it was introduced in version v4.13 by commit 65c7006f234c9ede887d468f595f259a5c5cc552. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: iavf: free q_vectors before queues in iavf_disable_vf
